comInf

Class ServerCom

  • java.lang.Object
    • comInf.ServerCom

  • public class ServerCom
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of the communication channel, server's side, for a communication based on sending/receiving messages through sockets using TCP Protocol. The data transfer is based on objects, one at a time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerCom(int portNumb)
      Communication channel instantiation.
      ServerCom(int portNumb, java.net.ServerSocket lSocket)
      Communication channel instantiation (2nd form).

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Establishment of the service. Listening socket's instantiation and his association to the local machine's address and the public port.

      • end

        public void end()
        Ending of the service. Closing of the listening socket.

      • accept

        public ServerCom accept()
                 throws java.net.SocketTimeoutException
        Listening process. Creation of a communication channel for a pending request. Communication socket's instantiation and its association to the server's address. Opening of the socket's entry and exit streams.
        Returns:
        returns the communication channel
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - throws this exception when a timeout occurs on the listening socket

      • close

        public void close()
        Closing of the communication channel, it's streams and it's socket.

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int time)
        Definition of a timeout for the listening socket.
        Parameters:
        time - time margin in which the timeout does not occur

      • readObject

        public java.lang.Object readObject()
        Reading of an oject from the communication channel.
        Returns:
        returns object read

      • writeObject

        public void writeObject(java.lang.Object toClient)
        Writing of an object on the communication channel.
        Parameters:
        toClient - object to be written
